title: 【Event Announcement】Welcome to join “Meeting with the President”
author: 林嘉瑩
content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 學務處生活輔導組 - 林嘉瑩 - tea7101@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話03-8906226
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【Event Announcement】Welcome to join “Meeting with the President”
日期： Sat, 13 Apr 2024 19:53:02 +0800
附檔： 112-2與校長有約E-mail提問單(中英文).docx (20 KB)   
Meeting with the President

Topic: Weaving the Future Together - The Road to Reconstruction and Recovery of Dong Hwa University Following the April 3rd Earthquake.

Event Description: This meeting will present an overview of the preliminary post-earthquake reconstruction and recovery plans of Dong Hwa university. We hope to gather valuable feedback from colleagues and students to further improve the post-disaster reconstruction of our university. 

If colleagues and students have questions or suggestions, please download the question form, fill it out, and send it to Mr. Wang ’s email at rlawwh@gms.ndhu.edu.tw for compilation. Meals will be provided on the day of the event; please register in advance to help us with headcount. (https://rb005.ndhu.edu.tw/p/423-1005-3424.php )

This meeting will also be available via live video streaming; details regarding the streaming link will be announced separately.

Event Times:

 • First session: April 16, 2024 (Tuesday) 12:00-13:00
 • Second session: April 17, 2024 (Wednesday) 12:00-13:00

Location: Administrative Building, 4th Floor, Room 416

Acceptance of Questions: April 14, 2024 (Sunday) to April 16, 2024 (Wednesday)

Registration Period: April 14, 2024 (Sunday) to April 16, 2024 (Wednesday)

Event Contact: Mr. Wang, Student Living Service Division, Tel: 03-890-6221
Office of Student Affairs
